about_the_game:
Camp Counsellor Collector is a 2D pixel graphics, single-player game with a unique storyline. You play as The Collector, a strong but scary Protagonist that lives in a run down mansion. Your job is to hunt and capture Camp Counsellor's, cute and sexy women that you keep in your basement hoping that one day you can marry them.

Camp Counsellor Collector features a variety of gameplay elements, including:

Exploration: Explore the haunted mansion and discover its secrets.
Hunting: Track down and capture Camp Counsellor's.
Customization: Customize your The Collector with a variety of accessories and Items.
Story: Unravel the mystery of The Collector's past and why it keeps Camp Counsellor's in his basement.
If you're looking for a unique and challenging gaming experience, Camp Counsellor Collector is the game for you.

Where fear and desire collide.

Camp Counsellor Collector is a dark and twisted game that is sure to thrill players who are looking for something different. The game's unique setting and premise are sure to draw in players, and the challenging gameplay will keep them coming back for more.

content_descriptors.notes: Cartoon Images of females in compromising positions

name: Camp Counsellor Collector

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any sound card
  • VR Support: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any SoundCard
  • VR Support: N/A

Your job is to hunt and capture Camp Counsellor's, cute and sexy women that you keep in your basement.
